outcome.title: Graphing Quadratic Functions
outcome.description: I can graph quadratic functions and identify their axis of symmetry and maximum or minimum point.

outcome.title: Quadratic Models and Meanings
outcome.description: I can use quadratic models to solve an application problem and establish conclusions.

outcome.title: Graphs of Polynomial Functions
outcome.description: I can find the intercepts, estimated locations of maxima and minima, and end behavior of a polynomial function, and use this information to sketch the graph.

outcome.title: Division of Polynomials
outcome.description: I can rewrite a rational function as a polynomial plus a proper rational function.

outcome.title: Zeros of Polynomial Functions
outcome.description: I can determine the zeros of a given polynomial function, write a polynomial function given information about its zeros and their multiplicities, and I can use the Factor Theorem.

outcome.title: Graphs of Rational Functions
outcome.description: I can find the domain, vertical and horizontal asymptotes, holes, and intercepts of a rational function and use this information to sketch the graph.
